tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Waste_Disposal_Tracking (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type VARCHAR(255),
  disposal_location VARCHAR(255),
  disposal_date DATE,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE WasteTracking (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    waste_id INT,
    disposal_id INT,
    compliance_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (waste_id) REFERENCES WasteDisposal(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (disposal_id) REFERENCES WasteDisposal(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (compliance_id) REFERENCES ComplianceRegulations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE HazardousWasteDisposal (
    waste_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    waste_name VARCHAR(255),
    disposal_date DATE,
    disposal_location VARCHAR(255),
    disposal_method VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCompliance (
    compliance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_id UUID,
    waste_id UUID,
    compliance_date DATE,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteTracking (
    tracking_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    waste_id UUID,
    disposal_date DATE,
    disposal_location VARCHAR(255),
    disposal_method VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_disposal (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type TEXT,
  disposal_method TEXT,
  disposal_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE waste_tracking (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disposal_id INT,
  tracking_date DATE,
  tracking_location TEXT,
  tracking_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_compliance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disposal_id INT,
  compliance_type TEXT,
  compliance_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_locations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name TEXT,
  location_address TEXT,
  location_contact TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_audit (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disposal_id INT,
  audit_date DATE,
  audit_result TEXT,
  remarks TEXT
)
